articles.title: Instagram tests removing the ability to share posts to stories - The Verge
articles.description: In certain countries, Instagram is disabling the ability to reshare posts from your feed to Instagram stories. Reshares can be annoying, but many small businesses and artists rely on the feature to circumvent Instagram’s algorithm.
articles.content:
Instagram says people prefer to see original photos and videos
Illustration by Alex Castro / The Verge

articles.title: Apple tests new way to unlock an iPhone without removing a face mask - CNN
